Terms & Conditions

Introduction

CareerX24 is a registered company, and under this entity, we are launching the OfferNHire domain to expand our services. These Terms & Conditions govern your use of our job portal. By accessing or using OfferNHire, you agree to comply with these terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our platform.

User Accounts

Registration: To access certain features, you may need to create an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the registration process.

Account Security: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

Use of the Platform

Job Listings: Employers may post job listings on our platform. We do not endorse or guarantee the accuracy of these listings.

Job Applications: Users may apply for jobs through our platform. We are not responsible for the hiring process or outcomes.

Prohibited Activities

  • Post false or misleading information.
  • Use the platform for any unlawful purposes.
  • Violate any intellectual property rights.
  • Upload harmful or malicious content.

User Content

Responsibility: Users are responsible for the content they post on OfferNHire. We do not endorse or assume liability for user-generated content.

License: By posting content, you grant OfferNHire a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, display, and distribute your content.

Privacy

Your use of OfferNHire is subject to our Privacy Policy, which outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information.

Payment and Fees

Services: Certain features may require payment. You agree to pay all applicable fees as described on our platform.

Refunds: Refunds are subject to our refund policy. Please review our refund policy for more information.

Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability

Disclaimer: OfferNHire is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of the platform's content.

Limitation of Liability: To the extent permitted by law, OfferNHire shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of your use of the platform.

Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold OfferNHire harmless from any claims, losses, damages, liabilities, and expenses arising out of your use of the platform or violation of these terms.

Modifications

We reserve the right to modify these Terms & Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.

Termination

We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for any reason, including violation of these terms. Upon termination, you must cease all use of the platform.

Governing Law

These Terms & Conditions are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of Bangalore, Karnataka, India.

Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us at connect@offernhire.com
